document.masterDocTitle: The types of Anthomyiidae (Diptera) in the Shanghai Entomological Museum, Chinese Academy of Science, China

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: The types of Anthomyiidae (Diptera) in the Shanghai Entomological Museum, Chinese Academy of Science, China

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
tridigitata Fan & Chen
in
Fan et al ., 1984a: 239
( Botanophila ).

paragraph.materialsCitation:
Holotype male with labels: (1) printed with handwritten inscriptions on white label: “
Qilian Niuxin Mountain
/ no. 96 / Chinese Academy of Sciences ”; (2) handwritten on white label: “
1974.VII.1
/ collector Zide Fan ”’; (3) handwritten on white label: “ Botanophila tridigitiformis sp.n. ”; (4) printed with handwritten inscriptions on red label: “ TYPE /
Botanophila
/
tridigitata
/ Fan et Chen ”.

subSubSection.paragraph: Preservation: pinned; specimen intact.

Botanophila
/
tridigitata
/ Fan et Chen ”
.
Preservation: pinned; genitalia dissected and mounted on paper triangle.
